ygData.subject: Re: getting pp & gear
ygData.msgSnippet: No mobs in BB carry robes. Robes are generally found in dungeons such as, Najena, Dalnir, Lower Guk etc...they can also be aquired through various quests.
ygData.messageBody:
No mobs in BB carry robes. Robes are generally
found in dungeons such as, Najena, Dalnir, Lower Guk
etc...they can also be aquired through various quests.
<br><br>As for good loot, money, armor etc...you aren't
going to find any until you get to be a higher level.
It gets pretty good after 30 when you can get a full
group and fight in the higher dungeons.<br><br>Hope
that helps! ^_^<br><br>Zinfandel Whyte<br>42 Wood Elf
Druid Tunare<br>The Tribunal
Server<br><br>Pinidasy<br>8 Half Elf Rogue Bristlebane<br>The Tunare Server
